DOC.brief_title: Effects Different Types Exercise Interventions Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Meta-analyses evaluate effect structure exercise program patient type 2 diabetes demonstrate regular physical activity improve glycosylated haemoglobin ( König et al . : Resistance Exercise Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus , Deutsche Zeitschrift für Sportmedizin Jahrgang 62 , Nr . 1 ( 2011 ) : 5-9 ) . Sigal et al . prove either aerobic resistance train alone improve glycemic control type 2 diabetes , improvement greatest combine aerobic resistance training ( Sigal , RJ , et al . : Effects Aerobic Training , Resistance Training , Both Glycemic Control Type 2 Diabetes , Ann Intern Med . 2007 Sep 18 ; 147 ( 6 ) :357-69 ) . Therefore , aim current study compare effect aerobic endurance training resistance endurance train combination aerobic endurance training resistance endurance training diabetes type 2 patient without lifestyle dietary intervention .
